arts.ttl: Philipp Hofmann lifts Bochum to crucial victory over St. Pauli
arts.sum: VfL Bochum secured a vital 1-0 victory over St. Pauli courtesy of Philipp Hofmann's well-executed goal to move to within five points of Bundesliga safety. Philipp Hofmann of Bochum wins an aerial duel against Eric Smith of St. Pauli, showcasing the physical nature of the match - IMAGO/Eibner-Pressefoto/Frank Zeising

arts.ttl: Bochum claim vital three points in relegation six-pointer
arts.sum: Philipp Hofmann's goal proved the difference as Bochum picked up three vital points against FC St. Pauli in the race to avoid relegation.

arts.ttl: Bochum vs St. Pauli preview: Bochum eye successive home win
arts.sum: Separated by eight points in the bottom half of the Bundesliga standings, bottom side Bochum welcome St. Pauli to Vonovia Ruhrstadion on Wednesday evening, with both sides looking to bounce back after losses at the weekend.

2.Bundesliga champions St Pauli sit just outside the relegation places after picking up three wins on their travels to go with a solitary home win. Beleaguered Bochum bagged their first win of the se...

arts.ttl: Preview: VfL Bochum vs. St Pauli - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Bundesliga clash between VfL Bochum and St Pauli, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
